akn:section.akn:heading: Task force to counter economic coercion by the People’s Republic of China

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Sense of Congress It is the sense of Congress that—

(b) Establishment of Task Force Not later than 180 days after December 23, 2022, the President shall establish an interagency task force to be known as the “Countering Economic Coercion Task Force” (referred to in this section as the “Task Force”).

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Assistance for countries and entities targeted by the People’s Republic of China for economic coercion

akn:content.akn:p: (g) Assistance for countries and entities targeted by the People’s Republic of China for economic coercion The Secretary of State, the Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development, the United States International Development Finance Corporation, the Secretary of Commerce, and the Secretary of the Treasury shall provide appropriate assistance to countries and entities that are subject to coercive economic practices by the People’s Republic of China.
